messages.message:
my crafting sandbox and a cypress crafting sandbox are taking forever to build this morning, is anything wrong at the moment. They seem to both be stuck in the customize home step.

I see this error in the logs:
```Failed to connect to configured Instabase cluster      {"error": "'/opt/sandboxd/bin/cs k8s intercept start --reset --ingress-disable-auth --namespace intes-use2-crafting-aihub-instabase --infra crafting-aihub --ingress crafting-aihub:svc/intes-use2-crafting-aihub-instabase/service-server-nginx:443' failed with exit status 1"}```
something appears quite screwed up with the crafting aihub cluster, I can't even interact with it via kubectl :upside_down_face:
waiting for a response from the crafting devs: https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C03B865Q74K/p1740071555031959

Quick update on sandbox connectivity issues with crafting-aihub -- we've confirmed no recent changes were pushed on crafting's side that may have introduced a regression, and that our network policies aren't unintentionally blocking the crafting daemons. The crafting team is currently investigating a suspected issue, will update here again as soon as we have more info!
Thanks yah, this is blocking developemnt on crafting at the moment in terms of seeing the site, but I can still connect via ssh into the code at least

This should be resolved now! The crafting team is investigating the specific cause, but the mitigation boiled down to restarting the connection bridge in their infra to clear out a bunch of cached connections that should have been deleted a while ago.

Please reach out if you are still having trouble connecting your sandbox and I will take a look!
how should I get it to work again? When I click to restart the workspace, it still remains on the customize home step
I think yours is still building webpack: https://instabase.sandboxes.site/logviewx/instabase/udit-dev-2/dev/task/setup%3ACustomizeHome
yeah looks like it just completed :slightly_smiling_face:
